name: Haoyang Wang (王灏洋)
description:
Haoyang Wang is currently a Ph.D. candidate with the [Tsinghua SIGS](https://www.sigs.tsinghua.edu.cn), advised by [Prof. Xinlei Chen](https://scholar.google.com.hk/citations?hl=zh-CN&user=Ha8rlUgAAAAJ). He obtained his B.Eng. degree from Central South University, in 2022. His research interests include Artifical Internet-of-Things (AIoT), mobile computing, distributed & embedded AI. He is enjoying building proof-of-concepts for innovative applications, encompassing both hardware and software aspects. Finally, he is a student member of the ACM and IEEE.
E-Mail: haoyang-22@mails.tsinghua.edu.cn
